text: department of transportation general functions prohibition on commuter rail projects amend rsa ii a to read as follows a planning developing and maintaining a state transportation network which will provide for safe and convenient movement of people and goods throughout the state by means of a system of highways railroads air service mass transit and other practicable modes of transportation in order to support state growth and economic development and promote the general welfare of the citizens of the state provided however unless approved by the legislature no state funds shall be appropriated or expended for the project named project number in the ten year transportation improvement plan
